ref: 2127 unmārjayati, únmārṣṭi ʻ makes smooth, polishes ʼ AV. [√mr̥j]

M. umaj̈ṇẽ ʻ to understand thoroughly ʼ cf. umaṭ m. ʻ clear understanding ʼ < únmr̥ṣṭa -- 1 and similar development s.vv. śuddhi -- , śudhyati. -- LM 298 < únmajjati; Panse Jñān 122 < údbudhyatē with m from samaj̈ṇẽ < saṁbudhyatē.
